```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```



## Read data

```{r read_data}
data_6 <- read.csv("./20190708-141738_the-maturity-of-baby-sounds-part-6_answers.csv", sep=';')
data_7 <- read.csv("./20190708-145538_the-maturity-of-baby-sounds-part-7_answers.csv", sep=';')
```


## Analysis

```{r first_analysis}
hist_6 <- data_6 %>%
  group_by(Media.File) %>% 
  count()

hist_6 %>% 
  group_by(n) %>% 
  tally()
# Histogram of number of annotations
hist(hist_6$n)

hist_7 <- data_7 %>%
  group_by(Media.File) %>% 
  count()

hist_7 %>% 
  group_by(n) %>% 
  tally()

hist(hist_7$n)
  
```
